title: New: IYES – Daddy
content:
Having created quite the stir with their two debut tracks, Lighthouse and Glow, Brighton’s IYES have cemented their place as one of the UK’s most exciting new acts.

With a set at CitR Live #001 last week, and forthcoming shows at Liverpool Sound City and The Great Escape, 2013 is shaping up pretty well for them. New track, Daddy, takes a step back from the slick-pop of their previous outings, and almost serves as an interlude to what’s to come. Entirely instrumental, there’s hints of Irish duo Solar Bears in the production and grandeur of the track, check it out below and grab a free download under that.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
